text: Yvonne Joyce Craig (May 16, 1937 – August 17, 2015) was an American ballet dancer and actress. She is best known for her role as Batgirl from the 1960s TV series Batman and as the Orion Marta in the Star Trek: The Original Series. Craig was born on May 16, 1937 in Taylorville, Illinois. She was raised in Columbus, Ohio. Craig was married to Jimmy Boyd from 1960 until they divorced in 1962. She was married to Kenneth Aldrich from 1988 until she died. Craig died of breast cancer at her home in Pacific Palisades, Los Angeles, aged 78.Yvonne Craig, who played Batgirl, dies at 78 == References == == Other websites == * *Yvonne Craig's Official Personal Home Page *Ty's Yvonne Craig Homepage *MSN Entertainment – Yvonne Craig * * Yvonne Craig at TV.com *Bat- Bios – Yvonne Craig *Yvonne Craig as Batgirl *Yvonne Craig Interview at Elvis2001.net Category:1937 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from Illinois Category:Actors from Columbus, Ohio Category:American dancers Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Ballerinas Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Deaths from breast cancer
title: Yvonne Craig
